document_data.caption: [[Regis]]' ruby pendant as portrayed in [[Dragon magazine 386|Dragon #386]].
document_data.name: ''Ruby pendant of beguiling''
document_data.value: 70,000 [[gp]]{{Cite web/The Lone Drow: Companions of the Hall}}
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ruby pendant of beguiling''''' was a ruby pendant with the powers of a ''[[rod of beguiling]]''.
document_data.Effects: The pendant was very powerful. Any creature within 30 feet (9 meters) of the pendant would feel the effects of a ''[[charm monster]]'' spell. The enchantment remained as long as the creature was within sight of the pendant.
document_data.Notable examples: [[Pasha]] [[Pook]] once owned a ''ruby pendant'', and it was a key to his move to the top of the [[Calimport]] criminal world. The gem was stolen by [[Regis]],[[Dragon (magazine)]] #386 p.30 for [[Icewind Dale]], where he used the ruby to gain the upper hand in the negotiation in [[Ten Towns]].<ref> [[Artemis Entreri]] was sent to find the gem and the [[halfling|hin]] and get them back to Pook.
